summary: This morning, I woke up to find myself tagged by one of my favorite bloggers, Jedda as part of the Bear Blog Challenge.  This challenge was created by Ava.  It's a take on those fun little questions that get passed around on social media or other platforms...
title: Bear Blog Questions Challenge

summary:
Everything is a web page
Prolific bloggers and webpage-makers often have a tendency toward thinking about their content in very specific ways.  This is a static web page, but that is a blog post.  One is like a piece of furniture, and the other might be more like a magazine...
title: Everything is a web page
